parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: Query page number, used for pagination.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Query page size, used for pagination.

parameters.name: Phase
parameters.description:
WAF rule type. Values:

- http_anti_scan: Scan protection
- http_bot: Bots

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) interface.
